name: media-organiser
title: Media Organiser
description: Organizes media files by capture date or aspect ratio
author: jose_brito

commands.name: group-by-capture-date
commands.title: Group by Capture Date
commands.subtitle: Media Organiser
commands.description: Organizes photos and videos in folders according to their capture date

commands.name: group-by-aspect-ratio
commands.title: Group by Aspect Ratio
commands.subtitle: Media Organiser
commands.description: Organizes image files into folders based on their aspect ratio (Landscape, Portrait, Square)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
